extraMembers.postDescMobile: Pick up messages from your home phone when you're out, record a personal greeting and control how many times your phone rings.
extraMembers.preDescMobile: Pick up messages from your home phone when you're out, record a personal greeting and control how many times your phone rings.
extraMembers.postDesc: You've got Voicemail Plus,which means you can pause, rewind and fast-forward messages on your home phone, record a personal greeting and choose how many times your phone rings before going to voicemail.
extraMembers.preDes: With Voicemail Plus you can pause, rewind and fast-forward messages on your home phone, record a personal greeting and choose how many times your phone rings before going to voicemail.

extraMembers.postDescMobile: Store up to 10 messages on your home phone and listen to them at any time.
extraMembers.preDescMobile: Store up to 10 messages on your home phone and listen to them at any time.
extraMembers.postDesc: You have voicemail, which means you can store up to 10 messages on your home phone and listen to them at any time by calling 1571.
extraMembers.preDes: With  voicemail, you can store up to 10 messages on your home phone and listen to them at any time by calling 1571.
